overview: In June 1982 Golden Earring perfomed at Cologne for Rockpalast and this DVD includes the Rockpalast concert including the band’s mega hits Radar Love and Twilight Zone.  Sartory-Säle Cologne  05 June 1982  01 Candy's going bad  02 Leahter  03 No for an answer  04 Heartbeat  05 Save your skin  06 Future  07 Vanilla queen  08 Twilight zone  09 Radar love  10 The devil made me do it  11 Slow down  12 Buddy Joe  13 Back home  14 I need love  15 Just like Vince Taylor
title: Golden Earring: At Rockpalast
